alert.note: Alert for Emmet; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 11:44AM CST until January 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Moderate to Heavy Snowfall Continues Early This Afternoon... .Moderate to heavy snow continues to make it`s way east through the state early this morning. Snowfall has begun to taper off in western Iowa, with the bands of heavier snowfall now oriented SW to NE over the eastern half of Iowa. Snowfall measurements have begun to pour in from throughout the state this morning, with values ranging between 6 to 11 inches over central and southern Iowa, then lower amounts from 3 to 6 inches north and west. Snow amounts of 4 to 7 inches have been reported in the east, but snow continues to fall in this region. Poor road conditions have developed throughout the state this morning, with multiple accidents being reported. Make sure to stay off roads if at all possible, and take it slow if you must be out. In addition to the snowfall, breezy winds have developed over much of the state, with gusts generally around 30 to 40 mph, and a few locations seeing occasional gusts over 45 mph. As a result, blowing and drifting snow is expected through the afternoon and evening, especially in areas where snow continues to fall. Gusty winds will also continue to cause reduced visibilities and prolong poor driving conditions even after the falling snow concludes this evening. Winds then diminish tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow ending, but blowing snow continues through the afternoon. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...North Central Iowa. * WHEN...From now to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions. Patchy blowing snow will reduce visibility, perhaps significantly at times. Hazardous travel conditions will impact this morning`s commute with lingering impacts into the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Emmet; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Winnebago; Worth
